title: Generative AI for Older Adult Healthcare Connectivity
description: Developed an MVP of a generative AI chatbot and dashboard for real-time healthcare communication. Iteratively enhancing conversational capabilities with context-awareness, memory, and adaptive responses. Conducting co-design sessions with older adults and healthcare providers.

title: Developers’ Cognitive Biases during Code Review
description: Mined GitHub pull requests and review comments to study developers’ biases during code review. Applied sampling strategies and began automating dataset analysis using NLP and ML.

title: GitHub Reviewer Recommendation
description: Designed a model to recommend reviewers for GitHub pull requests using topic modeling (NMF, LDA), social network analysis, and PageRank.
